text.section: Except as otherwise provided in this section, a credit allowed under this subtitle is allowed against the State income tax only.
A credit under § 10-701 of this subtitle is allowed against the total county and State income taxes.

section.section: A credit allowed under § 10-704(a)(1) or § 10-709(b)(1) of this subtitle is allowed against the State income tax only.
A credit allowed under § 10-704(a)(2) or § 10-709(b)(2) of this subtitle is allowed against the county income tax only.
